text: Posting my standup status here because I’m going to be out during stand-up. I am blocked on Spotlight awaiting designs for empty state and a real endpoint from backend. So I’m picking up Social Login bugs :slightly_smiling_face:
have you commented on the tickets you’re blocked on?
and when do we get photos of Julep
Not yet. I can do that now... As far as I know, the empty states stories that I'm blocked on are in process of getting written. So maybe blocked is a little premature :P
I'll comment on #spotlight-featureteam to check on the status of the end of the
Yeah, I think Lora & team have been starting to follow the tickets more closely so whenever possible I’d ensure blockers are called out there in addition to in the public channels
